 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָבַד‎</span>] **verb** ==be-spread, deck== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see ***shew patches of colour, become clouded*** (of sky); Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹבֶד‎</span> ***pavement, paved terrace***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺבֵדָא‎</span> ***pavement***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְבֵרִּים רָבֵדְתִּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְשִׂי‎</span> [[Prov.7.16|Prov 7:16]] ***with spreads*** (coverlets) ***have I be spread my couch***; read also ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִרְבְּדוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשָׁאוּל‎</span> [[1Sam.9.25|1Sam 9:25]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְדַבֵּר‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם שׁ‎</span>, object omitted.
